Errors.ShortMessage: Il se peut que les fonds provenant de vos ventes ne soient pas disponibles et qu'ils apparaissent comme étant bloqués pendant un certain temps.

Errors.ShortMessage: Your previously selected shipping service has been replaced with another shipping service.
Errors.LongMessage: Your previously selected shipping service Lettre prioritaire has been replaced with another shipping service Lettre Verte.
